DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy , tolerability safety intranasal ketorolac tromethamine ( SPRIX ) option pain management post vasectomy patient .
DOC.brief_title: Intranasal Ketorolac Tromethamine ( SPRIX ) Short Term Pain Management Post-Vasectomy Pain
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Male Subject must age twenty five ( 25 ) year sixty four ( 64 ) 2 . Willing able provide inform consent 3 . Has make decision undergo vasectomy 4 . Subject good general physical condition assess Principal Investigator EXCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Current treatment know allergy sensitivity form ketorolac tromethamine , aspirin , non steroidal anti inflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid ( EDTA ) 2 .
